Desc.entry: A contemporary art space and studio complex located in the city centre. Bloc is a not-for-profit artist led organisation that co-ordinates a programme of exhibitions, events and art activities that are free to the public. Has 60 studios available to rent, offering a vibrant and creative workspace facility for a wide variety of artists.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Please see website for exhibition programme

category.entry: ART GALLERIES, ART WORKSHOPS AND STUDIOS FOR HIRE
